text: Father Gets in the Game is a 1908 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithFather Gets in the GameFATHER GETS IN THE GAME and stars Mack Sennett, Harry Solter, and George Gebhardt. ==Actors== * Mack Sennett as Bill Wilkins * Harry Solter as Wilkins' Son * George Gebhardt as Professor Dyem / First Couple * Linda Arvidson * Charles Avery as The Butler * Charles Gorman * Charles Inslee as Clumsy Waiter (unconfirmed) * Florence Lawrence as First Couple * Marion Leonard * Jeanie MacPherson ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Father Gets in the Game
